text.section: The cosmetologist board shall hold hearings upon the request of any person directly affected by the board's decision to refuse to issue or renew a license or to deny, suspend, probate, fine, or revoke a license. A licensee or applicant shall request a hearing within thirty (30) days of the board's notice that it seeks to refuse to issue or renew a license, or to deny, suspend, probate, fine, or revoke a license. The hearing shall be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.
Rulings of the board as a result of any hearing may be appealed to the Franklin Circuit Court in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.
